General.Name: Citatah Tbk
General.Description: PT Citatah Tbk manufactures and sells marble and marble handicrafts products in Indonesia. The company offers slabs, tiles, and special products, as well as limestone and imported building materials for commercial and residential projects. It sells its products in retail and wholesale markets, as well as B-to-B market. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Karawang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Tarum Timur No. 64, Karawang, Indonesia, 41373

1.Name: Ms. Tiffany  Johanes
